articles.title: National Meeting Held to Mark Anniversary of Victory in Fatherland Liberation War
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks War Victory Day in DPRK
Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place in the plaza of the Monument to the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War on Wednesday to celebrate the 64th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae and other senior party, state army officials, members of the party central leadership in Pyongyang, officials of party and armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions, men and officers of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials of institutions and industrial establishments in the city, persons of merit, youth and students and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front and overseas compatriots.
					
					 Army General Pak Yong Sik, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea and minister of the People's Armed Forces, made a report at the meeting.
					
					 The reporter said that the Korean people humbled the arrogance of the U.S. imperialists who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world on July 27, Juche 42 (1953) and won a great victory in the Fatherland Liberation War. This was a historical event that guaranteed the eternal future of the country and the nation, he said, and went on:
					
					 July 27 is a proud revolutionary holiday in which the DPRK beat back the formidable U.S. imperialism for the first time in the world history of wars and recorded the first page of great victory in the history of confrontation with the U.S.
					
					 The Fatherland Liberation War was an actually hard-fought battle for the just 2-year-old DPRK as it had to beat back the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces, and it was the fiercest revolutionary war in the world history of wars.
					
					 It was something beyond common sense for the DPRK with a short history of its regular army and weapons found insufficient and weak economic potentials to fight a modern war against the U.S. imperialists which became corpulent and fatty through aggression and plunder.
					
					 When the whole world was following the developments in Korea, holding its breath, President Kim Il Sung, an ever-victorious and iron-willed brilliant commander, expressed the resolute will to show the stamina of the Koreans to the enemies and aroused the entire army and all the people to the do-or-die battle against the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 In hearty response to his speech "Every Effort for the Victory of War" aired over radio, the Korean army and people rose as one and waged a do-or-die battle to defeat the U.S. imperialist aggressors and created a legendary story about the victory in the war, going beyond the expectation of the world people.
					
					 The shining victory won by the Korean people in the war was a military miracle in the 20th century that put an end to the myth of the U.S. "mightiness" and made the beginning of final ruin of U.S. imperialism.
					
					 The feats of significance in the history of the nation and the world performed by the President, who led the war to victory and thus saved the destiny of the country and the nation and made undying contributions to the anti-imperialist, anti-U.S. struggle and the cause of human emancipation, will shine for all ages with the victorious advance of the great Paektusan nation.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are now working hard to mount a reckless military attack on the DPRK, taken aback by its might getting stronger day by day as a world-level nuclear and rocket power.
					
					 If the enemies keep to the "theory of preemptive nuclear attack" threatening their own lifeline, misjudging the strategic position of the DPRK, the invincible Paektusan army will mount the most telling preemptive nuclear attack on the heart of the American empire without any warning or advance notice, as it had already declared, and thus eliminate the U.S. from the surface of the earth and achieve the historic cause of the country's reunification without fail.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Maldives
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Maldives
Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Wednesday sent a message of greeting to Abdulla Yameen Abdul Gayoom, president of the Republic of Maldives, on its independence day.
					 The message sincerely wished the people of Maldives progress and prosperity, expressing the belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would develop in the common interests of the two peoples.

articles.title: Syrian Delegation Here
articles.content:
Syrian Delegation Here
Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Syria Baath Children Organization led by Waddah Sawas, director of the Technology, Information and External Relations Department, arrived here on Tuesday.

articles.title: Floral Basket and Gift to Kim Jong Un from Japan Delegation
articles.content:
Floral Basket and Gift to Kim Jong Un from Japan Delegation
Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and a gift from the visiting delegation of Japan-Korea Friendship Linking with Juche.
					 The basket and gift were handed over to an official concerned by Toshikazu Suzuki, adviser of the Japanese Tokai Liaison Council for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism who is heading the delegation, on Wednesday.

articles.title: Senior Party and State Officials Visit Jonsung Revolutionary Site
articles.content:
Senior Party and State Officials Visit Jonsung Revolutionary Site
Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Senior party and state officials of the DPRK visited the Jonsung Revolutionary Site Wednesday on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Among them were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and Choe Ryong Hae.
					
					 The visitors placed bouquets at a mosaic depicting the image of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 They went round various places of the site, being briefed on the fact that the President inspiringly encouraged the Korean army and people to the war victory and worked out a grand plan for postwar reconstruction while staying there during the Fatherland Liberation War.

articles.title: War Martyrs Cemetery Visited by Many People
articles.content:
War Martyrs Cemetery Visited by Many People
Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Countless people are visiting the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery on the occasion of the DPRK's second Day of Liberation.
					 In July alone, servicepersons and officials of the Foreign Ministry, working people of the Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex and the Pyongyang Municipal People's Hospital No. 3, youth and students of Kim Chaek University of Technology and Pyongyang University of Mechanical Engineering and employees of many other units visited the cemetery to pay homage to the martyrs.
					
					 The visitors went round the monument to the teachings given by President Kim Il Sung, monument to the poem dedicated to the war martyrs and sculptures at the cemetery.

articles.title: Workers Meet Hero of Republic
articles.content:
Workers Meet Hero of Republic
Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Workers and trade union members met with Hero of the Republic Pak In Ho, a lecturer of the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, at the Central Hall of Workers on Wednesday with the approach of the 64th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Pak In Ho said that President Kim Il Sung's exploits for war victory serve as a precious treasure that made it possible for heroic Korea to fully display its might by winning a series of victories in the centuries-long standoff with the U.S.
					
					 He noted that the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army had beat back every war provocation move of the U.S. imperialists under the leadership of the peerlessly brilliant commanders.
					
					 After telling about how the U.S. armed spy ship Pueblo was captured when it illegally intruded into the territorial waters of the DPRK, Pak called on the workers and trade union members to fulfill their duties as befits the heroic Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il working class at every worksite of building a powerful socialist nation.
					
					 Then there was a performance by the workers' art group of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea.

articles.title: DPRK Bags Three Gold Medals at 2017 Asian Juvenile Weightlifting Championships
articles.content:
DPRK Bags Three Gold Medals at 2017 Asian Juvenile Weightlifting Championships
Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Kang Hyon Gyong of the DPRK won three gold medals at the 2017 Asian Juvenile Weightlifting Championships.
					 The championships started in Katmandu of Nepal from July 24, bringing together more than 230 men and women players from at least 20 countries and regions including the DPRK, Thailand and Kazakhstan.
					
					 Kang Hyon Gyong placed first in snatch and jerk in the junior women's 58 kg category. She snatched 95 kg and jerked 117 kg, 212 kg in total.

articles.title: Sanatorium for War Veterans Built in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Sanatorium for War Veterans Built in Pyongyang
Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- A new sanatorium for war veterans was built at the foot of Mt Ryongak in Pyongyang to mark the war victory day.
					 The sanatorium has all conditions for the rest and medical treatment of war veterans.
					
					 Its inauguration took place on Wednesday.

articles.title: War Veterans Leading Happy Life
articles.content:
War Veterans Leading Happy Life
Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Sanatoriums for veterans of the Fatherland Liberation War (1950-1953) took their shapes in scenic spots of Pyongyang and every province of the DPRK.
					 Each sanatorium has a total floor space of several thousand square meters, housing service facilities like rooms for therapy and fitness and barber's and pavilion, angling site and other resting places.
					
					 War veterans enjoy cultural and emotional life at those sanatoriums built under the loving care of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 In the DPRK, they are revered as the precious treasure of the country and held in high esteem as the generation who won the victory in the war.
					
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un has put them forward as laudable heroes and genuine patriots of the nation.
					
					 He took a measure to make it a tradition to significantly celebrate the war victory day (July 27) every year, noting that he respects and values war veterans as his grandfathers and fathers. And he enjoyed an art performance together with war veterans, who participated in the celebrations for the war victory day, and had a photo session with them.
					
					 He gave energetic guidance to the projects for remodeling the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum and building the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery.
					
					 And he personally initiated the construction of sanatoriums for war veterans, indicated orientation and ways for their construction and took all necessary measures to perfect them.

articles.title: National Sci-Tech Presentation in Farm Machine Field
articles.content:
National Sci-Tech Presentation in Farm Machine Field
Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- A national sci-tech presentation in the field of farm machinery took place at the Sci-Tech Complex on July 25-26 under the sponsorship of the Central Committee of the  General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea.
					 Attending it were teachers, researchers and graduate students from Kim Il Sung University, Pyongyang University of Agriculture, Kye Ung Sang Agricultural College of Kim Il Sung University, the Farm Machine Institute of the Farm Machinery Industrial Management Bureau and other units.
					
					 Presented to it were scores of scientific papers.
					
					 The participants heard the papers on achievements and experience gained in settling the sci-tech issues arising in realizing the integrated mechanization of agriculture.
					
					 Drawing attention of the participants were research successes conducive to increasing the rate of mechanization in the farm work such as development of modern multipurpose and multifunction farm machines.

articles.title: National Sci-tech Presentation in Field of Footwear Industry
articles.content:
National Sci-tech Presentation in Field of Footwear Industry
Wonsan, July 26 (KCNA) -- A national scientific and technological presentation in the field of footwear industry took place at the Wonsan Shoes Factory from July 24 to 26 under the sponsorship of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea.
					Â Present there were more than 30 units from across the country, including the Hamhung branch of the State Academy of Sciences, Kim Chaek University of Technology, the shoe-making institute of the Management Bureau for the Shoe-making Industry and the Wonsan Shoes Factory.
					
					 It heard more than 90 papers.

articles.title: Movement for Wining Title of Minchong Created in Wartime
articles.content:
Movement for Wining Title of Minchong Created in Wartime
Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- With the approach of the 64th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War (July 27, 1953), the people in the DPRK are recollecting the heroic feats performed by the Korean young people in defending the country from the armed invasion of the U.S. imperialists.
					 Typical of their feats is the movement for wining the title of Minchong (the acronym of the Democratic Youth League in Korean).
					
					 In the wartime, President Kim Il Sung called for waging the movement for wining the title of Minchong, a mass movement aimed at killing many more enemies by caring for weaponry and increasing their power.
					
					 True to his instruction, Jo Kun Sil, a soldier of the Korean People's Army (KPA), made a firm determination to distinguish himself on the field of battle at a meeting of Minchong members of his company held in April Juche 40 (1951) with the battle on Height 902.4 ahead.
					
					 Though he was seriously wounded in his arms and legs at the battle, he pressed the trigger of his heavy machine gun with his jaw to the last moments of his life to sweep away enemies.
					
					 In high praise of his heroic feat, Kim Il Sung saw to it that the title of the DPRK hero was awarded to him and the title of Minchong to his heavy machine gun No. 236.
					
					 In the period of the war, a number of guns, tanks, airplanes, warships and trucks were honored with the title of Minchong.
					
					 Indeed, the movement encouraged servicepersons to perform heroic feats and made a great contribution to strengthening the combat capability of the KPA units during the war.

articles.title: Legendary Stories about Steady Victories of Korea Continues: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Legendary Stories about Steady Victories of Korea Continues: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- July 27 is the holiday for proud victors of the DPRK as they defended the dignity and sovereignty of the country from the aggression of the U.S. imperialists and put them, who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world, on a downhill turn.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in an article.
					
					 The war victory on July 27 shattered to smithereens the myth of "mightiness" of the U.S. imperialists and opened the new era of upsurge in the anti-imperialist, anti-U.S. struggle, the article states, and goes on:
					
					 There unfolds again the history of the victory in the war in the DPRK in which it beat back the U.S. imperialists in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 The successful test-launch of ICBM Hwasong-14 is the full demonstration of the heroic spirit of the great Paektusan nation dashing ahead like the wind with the might of self-reliance and self-development and its invincible national power. This episode fundamentally changed the strategic position of the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists, driven into a tight corner, resort to sanctions and blockade against the DPRK as last card to check its existence and development. However, it is as foolish an act as running one's head against a wall.
					
					 The DPRK has emerged as a nuclear and rocket power which no force dares provoke and is hastening the day of the final victory while dealing hard blows at the U.S. imperialists like that 60 odd years ago when the DPRK forced them to show the white flag.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and their vassal forces should clearly know that their persistent moves for confrontation would only invite disgrace of the loser and that the legendary stories about invincible victory of Songun Korea will continue. 
					
					 Songun Korea is dynamically marching towards the July 27th of the final victory.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Flails S. Korean Lackeys' Total Dependence on U.S.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Flails S. Korean Lackeys' Total Dependence on U.S.
Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities are mulling purchasing U.S. merchant ship Lane Victory that was mobilized for the Korean war at huge expenses.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a commentary says the south Korean authorities' act of mulling purchasing the old ship of their American master is a farce that can be staged only by those steeped in dependence on outsiders to the marrow of their bones.
					
					 The south Korean authorities' attempt at buying the ship clearly proves the despicable true colors of the pro-U.S. lackeys keen on stifling the fellow countrymen while serving the U.S. as their master and "benefactor", though it had inflicted holocaust and disaster on the Korean nation, the news analyst says, and goes on:
					
					 Remaining unchanged is the U.S. ambition for aggression to meet its own interests at the sacrifice of the destiny and interests of the Korean nation.
					
					 The south Korean authorities' wild act proves that those who blindly worship the U.S. and who are steeped in pro-Americanism are bound to eulogize a robber as savior and regard scrap iron as treasure.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should immediately stop the sordid deal, clearly mindful that their introduction of the ship would bring curse and censure from the nation and the generations to come.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts Japanese Authorities' Bid to Step up Building of Fascist System
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts Japanese Authorities' Bid to Step up Building of Fascist System
Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- The law on punishing organized crimes, that had been retrogressively revised in Japan, took effect on July 11.
					 The Japanese ruling forces are defending the enforcement of the law on punishing organized crimes, claiming the law is aimed to punish all those involved in case terrorist organization or violence group and other groups of organized crimes plan a crucial crime like abduction and smuggling of drugs, and that the enforcement is important for the safety of nationals.
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says the law on punishing organized crimes is a product of the sordid trick of the Japanese fascists to suppress the local progressive forces and create a springboard favorable for militarization.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 The law is a dangerous fascist law restraining freedom of the ordinary citizens and allowing the surveillance of them.
					
					 It is not a war but peace which is desired by the Japanese people.
					
					 It is the political purpose of the Japanese reactionary rulers to revive the hideous fascist system and the departed soul of the Japanese imperialist era.
					
					 They seek to gag the local progressive forces, media and people and bind them hand and foot.
					
					 The danger of the law as a fascist law lies in that it can suppress even the progressive figures who disclose the distortion of history under the law on punishing organized crimes.
					
					 Japan is openly revealing its nature as a war state, a fascist state.
					
					 Should the Japanese authorities truly stand for safety of their nationals, they should stop the fascist moves aimed at fabricating a war state.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams S. Korean Authorities for Tarnishing DPRK Image
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams S. Korean Authorities for Tarnishing DPRK Image
Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Recently, the south Korean authorities, including the minister of Foreign Affairs and the vice-minister of Unification, pulled up the DPRK when meeting the special rapporteur on "human rights issue in north Korea" on a visit to Seoul.
					 They said that the "serious human rights records in the north are a matter of great concern", crying out for "cooperation with the international community."
					
					 Minju Joson in a commentary Wednesday says that this is little short of an absurd, sinister reckless act motivated by the intention to tarnish the image of the DPRK winning victory after victory with each passing day by internationalizing "human rights issue in the north."
					
					 There was no "human rights issue" under the people-centered socialist system of the DPRK and, therefore, such issue can never exist under such system.
					
					 This being a hard reality, the south Korean authorities are pulling up the DPRK over the "serious human rights record", crying out for "cooperation with the international community".
					
					 Such thing is nothing but an intolerable mockery of justice and truth and a blatant insult to the inviolable human rights.
					
					 It is south Korea that is beset with the biggest human rights problems in the world.
					
					 South Koreans from all walks of life are now waging struggles for sovereignty, vital rights and democracy in the streets despite sweltering weather.
					
					 No matter what rhetoric the south Korean authorities may let out to hurt the DPRK, backed by foreign forces, they can never tarnish the image of socialism centered on the popular masses but their act only reveal their anti-reunification nature.
					
					 The south Korean authorities would be well advised to be well aware that if they persist in confrontation with fellow countrymen, persistently trumpeting about "human rights" racket against the DPRK, they would meet the same fate as the Park Geun Hye group.

articles.title: Unreasonable Punishment upon Students Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Unreasonable Punishment upon Students Protested in S. Korea
Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean online newspaper Voice of People, student and teaching organizations of Seoul National University, Korea University and other universities and civic and public organizations of south Korea including the Bar Association for Democratic Society held a press conference on Monday denouncing the Seoul National University side for unreasonably punishing its students.
					 Speakers accused the university side of taking various disciplinary measures such as indefinite halt to attending school against the students who waged a sit-in strike in protest against its arbitrary practice.
					
					 Asking the university side if the action for democracy in the university is the reason for punishment, every political action taken by citizens with democratic conscience is liable to crackdown? queried the speakers. 
					
					 The double-dealing attitude of the university side clearly shows the action taken against the students is politically- motivated retaliation, they declared an action against this.

articles.title: Truth behind Soldier's Suicide Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Truth behind Soldier's Suicide Demanded in S. Korea
Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Teachers and students of Hongik University of south Korea held a press conference on July 24 in protest against the puppet military group's move to cover the truth behind the suicide of a solder, according to its internet paper Voice of People.
					 Speakers said with indignation that the military wants the suicide to disappear amid concern of people, just as it evaded the responsibility for it before.
					
					 After the outbreak of the incident, the military was busy about blocking the disclosure of the illegal action but never took into consideration the truth about the suicide and grudge of the dead and family.

articles.title: S. Korean Bodies Demand Authorities Release All Prisoners of Conscience
articles.content:
S. Korean Bodies Demand Authorities Release All Prisoners of Conscience
Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- 18 civic and social bodies of south Korea, including the Seoul Progress Solidarity and the Seoul Civil Rights Solidarity, held a news conference around Chongwadae on July 21, demanding the authorities release all prisoners of conscience on the occasion of August 15, according to the south Korean online paper OhmyNews.
					 The speakers demanded the authorities set free at once all prisoners of conscience, including the chairman of the Confederation of Trade Unions, who were suppressed during the Park Geun Hye regime, and abolish all deep-rooted evils for democracy and human rights.

articles.title: DPRK's Successful ICBM Test-fire Hailed in DR Congo
articles.content:
DPRK's Successful ICBM Test-fire Hailed in DR Congo
Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in DR Congo on July 15 to congratulate the DPRK on its successful test-fire of ICBM Hwasong-14.
					 On display in the venue of the meeting were photos showing the exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and books and photos introducing the struggle of the service personnel and people of the DPRK.
					
					 Present at the meeting were personages of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo, the DR Congo-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association, the Working Citizens' Association of DR Congo and other units and masses.
					
					 Speakers at the meeting congratulated the DPRK on its successful test-fire of Hwasong-14, saying that it was the victory of the DPRK and victory of justice and historic event putting an end to the arbitrariness of the U.S. which threatened the DPRK with nuclear weapons for over half a century and reliably guaranteed peace of the Korean peninsula and the region and showed once again the validity of DPRK's option for self-defence.
					
					 It is very just for the DPRK to bolster up defence capabilities for protecting the sovereignty of the country from the U.S. threat for aggression, they said, urging the U.S. to recognize the national power of the DPRK and its strategic position and switch over in the policy toward it.
					
					 A statement of solidarity was made public at the meeting.

articles.title: Nigerian Bodies Praise DPRK as Nuclear Power in East
articles.content:
Nigerian Bodies Praise DPRK as Nuclear Power in East
Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) ? The Korean people have strengthened the military capabilities for self-defence in every way for several decades and turned the country into the nuclear power in the East in defiance of the U.S. persistent nuclear threats and hostile policy.
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the Nigerian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Juche Philosophy and the Nigerian Group for Self-Reliance Studies said this in a joint statement on July 17.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 The U.S. ignited a war of aggression against the just two-year old DPRK, but it knelt down before the heroic Korean people after signing the Armistice Agreement.
					
					 The DPRK, possessor of nukes and satellite manufacturer and launcher, recently succeeded in the ICBM test-fire, passing through the final gateway to rounding off the state nuclear force.
					
					 The U.S. should properly see the strategic position of the DPRK, withdraw the hostile policy toward it, uproot the nuclear threats and hand off the Korean peninsula.
					
					 We express full support and solidarity for the struggle of the Korean people for building a socialist power and independently reunifying the country.

articles.title: Acto central por 64o aniversario de victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria
articles.content:
Acto central por 64o aniversario de victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria
Pyongyang, 26 de julio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este martes en el patio de educacion frente al Monumento a la Victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria el acto central por el 64o aniversario del mismo triunfo.
					Asistieron a la ocasion Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, los miembros del organo de direccion central del partido en la ciudad de Pyongyang, los funcionarios de organismos del partido y las fuerzas armadas, ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los funcionarios de los organismos, fabricas y empresas, los ameritados, los jovenes y estudiantes de la capital, el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang y los compatriotas residentes en ultramar.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres, Pak Yong Sik, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares.
					
					El 27 de julio del 42 (1953) de la Era Juche, el pueblo coreano logro la gran victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria derrotando al soberbio imperialismo yanqui que se jactaba de la "supremacia" mundial y este evento historico defiende y garantiza el futuro eterno de nuestra patria y nacion, apunto el ministro y continuo:
					
					El 27 de julio es la orgullosa fiesta revolucionaria que escribio la primera pagina de gran victoria en la historia de confrontacion con EE.UU. al vencer al poderoso imperialismo yanqui por primera vez en la historia mundial de guerras.
					
					La Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria fue la contienda muy dificil para la RPDC con menos de 2 anos de fundacion que debio rechazar la coalicion imperialista encabezada por EE.UU. Igualmente devino la guerra revolucionaria mas enconada en la historia mundial de guerras.
					
					Era algo inimaginable hacer la guerra moderna contra el imperialismo norteamericano, que se habia enriquecido de agresiones y saqueo, para un pais que tenia entonces corta historia de fuerzas armadas regulares, insuficientes armamentos y debil potencialidad economica.
					
					Cuando todo el mundo observaba atentamente el curso de la situacion de Corea, el Presidente Kim Il Sung, genial comandante de acero, expreso la resuelta voluntad de demostrar el temperamento de los coreanos a los agresores y movilizo a todo el ejercito y pueblo a la batalla de vida o muerte contra el imperialismo yanqui.
					
					Luego de escuchar su discurso radial "Todas las fuerzas para la victoria en la guerra", el ejercito y pueblo coreanos aniquilaron a los agresores yanquis mediante la lucha a muerte y crearon el mito de la victoria de guerra, al contrario de lo que preveia todo el mundo.
					
					La victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria fue el milagro militar del siglo XX que puso punto final al mito de la "supremacia" del imperialismo norteamericano y dio inicio a su decadencia definitiva.
					
					Las hazanas de importancia historica nacional y mundial realizadas por el Presidente, quien hizo aporte inmortal a la lucha antiimperialista y antiyanqui y la causa de liberacion de la humanidad al salvar el destino del pais y la nacion conduciendo a la victoria la guerra coreana, brillaran para siempre junto con el avance victorioso de la potencia Paektusan.
					
					Atemorizados por el aspecto de la RPDC que sale siempre victoriosa como potencia nuclear y coheteril de talla mundial, los imperialistas estadounidenses estan desesperados ahora para lanzar el ataque militar.
					
					Si los enemigos siguen recurriendo a la "teoria de ataque preventivo nuclear" de caracter suicida juzgando mal la posicion estrategica de la RPDC, el poderoso ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu asestara el golpe preventivo nuclear de castigo mas riguroso contra el corazon del imperio americano sin la advertencia ni aviso previo como ya hemos declarado.
					
					Asi, eliminaremos el territorio estadounidense del globo terraqueo y cumpliremos sin alta la historica causa de reunificacion de la patria.

articles.title: Se llena de visitantes el Museo Conmemorativo de Victoria en la Guerra
articles.content:
Se llena de visitantes el Museo Conmemorativo de Victoria en la Guerra
Pyongyang, 26 de julio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 64o aniversario de la victoria del pueblo coreano en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, los trabajadores de diversos estratos, los jovenes y estudiantes visitan en estos dias el Museo Conmemorativo de la Victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					En este mes, lo visitaron mas de 70 mil personas de mas de 500 entidades incluyendo los oficiales y soldados de EPC y funcionarios, trabajadores y estudiantes de la Universidad Kim Il Sung, el Ministerio de Industria Electrica, la Academia Estatal de Ciencias y la Fabrica de Cerveza Taedonggang.
					
					Ante la estatua de pie del Presidente Kim Il Sung respondiendo a la multitud en el desfile militar por la victoria en guerra, los visitantes recuerdan una vez mas sus proezas realizadas por ese triunfo.
					
					Pasando revista a las fotos exhibidas en el hall de heroes y a varias salas como las de fuerzas navales y las aereas, asimilan el espiritu de defensa a ultranza al lider y a la patria con que habian luchado los soldados heroicos y los habitantes de la retaguardia en los dias de contienda belica.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita dia de independencia de Maldivas
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita dia de independencia de Maldivas
Pyongyang, 26 de julio (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 26 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica de Maldivas, Abdulla Yameen Abdul Gayoom con motivo del dia de independencia de este pais.
					Convencido de que las relaciones de amistad entre los dos paises se desarrollaran conforme a los interese comunes de ambos pueblos, el remitente formulo votos por el progreso y prosperidad del pueblo maldivo.

articles.title: Kang Hyon Gyong obtiene 3 medallas de oro en campeonato asiatico
articles.content:
Kang Hyon Gyong obtiene 3 medallas de oro en campeonato asiatico
Pyongyang, 26 de julio (ACNC) -- La pesista coreana Kang Hyon Gyong conquisto 3 medallas de oro en el Campeonato Asiatico de Levantamiento de Pesas de Jovenes y Juniores 2017.
					En este certamen, iniciado el dia 24 en Katmandu de Nepal, participan mas de 230 jugadores de ambos sexos de mas de 20 paises y regiones, incluyendo la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Tailandia y Kazajstan.
					
					En la division de 58kg de la categoria juvenil (F), Kang ocupo primer lugar con un total de 212kg al levantar 95kg en el estilo arranque y el 117kg en envion.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena entrada en vigor de la ley enmendada en Japon
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena entrada en vigor de la ley enmendada en Japon
Pyongyang, 26 de julio (ACNC) -- Entro en vigor el dia 11 la ley de castigo del crimen organizado enmendada en Japon.
					Segun el alegato de las fuerzas gobernantes japonesas, la ejecucion de esa ley es un asunto importante para defender la seguridad del pueblo al castigar a todos los miembros de una organizacion terrorista, pandilla de gangsteres y otros grupos de crimen organizado si estos planean y preparan graves delitos como secuestro y narcotrafico.
					
					Pero, esa legislacion es un producto de la siniestra artimana de los fascistas japoneses para reprimir a las fuerzas progresistas del pais y preparar la base favorable a la militarizacion.
					
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual divulgado hoy y prosigue:
					
					Es decir, permite restringir la libertad de los ciudadanos comunes y vigilarlos bajo el rotulo del "crimen de preparacion del terrorismo".
					
					Lo que desea el pueblo japones no es la guerra, sino la paz.
					
					Sin embargo, los gobernantes reaccionarios japoneses persiguen el objetivo politico de resucitar la infame dictadura fascista y el fantasma del imperialismo.
					
					De ahi intentan amordazar y maniatar a las fuerzas progresistas, la prensa y el pueblo.
					
					La peligrosidad de la ley reside en poder reprimir a todas las personalidades progresistas que revelen los hechos tergiversados de la historia.
					
					Japon expone publicamente su perfil de Estado belico y fascista.
					
					Si las autoridades japonesas piensan de veras en la seguridad del pueblo, deberan dejar su intento de fabricar el Estado belico transformando la sociedad de manera fascista.

articles.title: Minju Joson condena a autoridades surcoreanas que acusan a la RPDC
articles.content:
Minju Joson condena a autoridades surcoreanas que acusan a la RPDC
Pyongyang, 26 de julio (ACNC) -- En el reciente encuentro con la comitiva del relator especial de los "DDHH del Norte (Corea)" de la ONU que viajo a Seul, la ministra de Relaciones Exteriores, el viceministro de Unificacion y otras autoridades surcoreanas censuraron a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea diciendo que la "grave situacion de DDHH del Norte es una seria preocupacion" y es necesaria la "cooperacion con la sociedad internacional".
					El periodico Minju Joson, en un comentario individual divulgado el dia 26, condena esos disparates como acto verbal absurdo y sucio para manchar la imagen de la RPDC, que avanza victoriosamente, al "internacionalizar" el "problema de DDHH del Norte".
					
					En el regimen socialista, centrado en las masas populares, no existe ni existira el "problema de DDHH", adelanta el comentario y continua:
					
					Sin embargo, las autoridades surcoreanas hablan tanto de la "grave situacion de DDHH del Norte" y la "cooperacion con la sociedad internacional", lo que deviene una burla intolerable a la justicia y verdad e insulto a los sagrados derechos humanos.
					
					En la actualidad, el Sur de Corea es justamente la sociedad obscura donde hay el peor problema de DDHH del mundo.
					
					En estos momentos tambien, los habitantes de varios estratos del Sur de Corea luchan en las calles, pese al calor sofocante, por la soberania, el derecho a existencia y la democracia.
					
					Aunque las autoridades surcoreanas dicen muchos chismes bajo el amparo de las fuerzas exteriores, nunca podran mellar la imagen del socialismo coreano, centrado en las masas populares, por el contrario, expondran solo su naturaleza anti-reunificacion.
					
					Ellas deben tener presente que sufriran el destino tragico como la banda de Park Geun-hye si siguen dedicandose a la campana de confrontacion fratricida, en particular, la ofensiva de "DDHH" anti-RPDC.
